comment: WasteWaterTreatment - Off-gas Stack adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.WasteWater/master/OffGasStack/schema.json
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic Off-gas Stack made for the Wastewater treatment domain. This entity represents stacks that are present in some wastewater treatment plants where the emissions, greenhouse gases included, are emitted.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: ch4
contents.comment: CH4 gas emissions from an off-gas stack entity.

contents.name: co2
contents.comment: CO2 gas emissions from an off-gas stack entity.

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: endsAt
contents.comment: A relationship indicating the entity the Off Gas Stack is connected to in the downstream point.

contents.name: n2o
contents.comment: N2O gas emissions from an off-gas stack entity.

contents.name: o2
contents.comment: O2 gas emissions from an off-gas stack entity.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: startsAt
contents.comment: A relationship indicating the entity the Off Gas Stack is connected to in the upstream point.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
